Introduction
This topic contains information on intake procedures for claims for presumptive SC for COVID-19, including
use of the COVID-19 special issue indicator
, and
handling allegations of COVID-19 exposure
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
